Articles.Content:
my challenge is simple, using either the Tyberdyne or Hope shuttle cargobay, disembark a spacecraft at a 300km orbit around Kerbin

then, using the power of the spacecraft alone, send as far from Kerbin as possible

points are awarded for the following

10 points-orbit higher than the starting 300km

15 points-orbit beyond the Mun

20 Points-orbit around Kerbol

30 Points-Escape velocity from Kerbol

bonus 10 points if spacecraft only has stock part

Cephei\'s energy plugin and any method of fuel regeneration is forbidden, otherwise all mods are permitted

you can partly control it with a mechjeb part(mechjeb IS permitted)
>_< i am a bit annoyed no-one is actually DOING this challenge
I plan on tackling this one. I know I can get something stock into kerbol escape from there. I just haven\'t played with the cargo bays much. I\'ll try later today
